title: Preparation
text:
Shopping List
Butcher:

2kg Lamb Shoulder (bone-in cut into chunks)

Supermarket:

4-6kg Potatoes
1 bag (1-2kg) Carrot
Quarter pumpkin
2x Zucchini
2x Eggplant
Mushrooms
Cherry Tomatoes
4 leaf salad (large bag)
1-2 slabs of Turkish bread
Garlic & Onion infused oil
1L Chicken Stock [This one or harmo dies ğŸ’€]
Tomato paste (~3 tbsp)
Sesame dressing
Ghee OR duck fat ğŸ‘€
Lactose free milk
Eggs (for lunch)

Herbs:

Cumin
(To Bring) Fennel
Thyme
Bay leaf
(To Bring) Parsley
(To Bring) Rosemary

Asian Grocer:

Spam (for lunch)
Soba Noodles (for lunch)

Assuming there is already:

Corn starch
Olive oil
Neutral oil
Salt & Pepper
Walnuts
Mirin
Soy Sauce
Dashi
Cooking sake

Assortment of: Carrot, Mushroom, Zucchini, Sweet potato (skip), pumpkin, eggplant
Herbs: Thyme, Sage (skippable), Parsley



Lamb shoulder

title: The Menu for 2025-01-04

The Protein
